bio: Mark has developed demos, implemented POCs, and spawned general chaos at Vonage for over 4 years. He has been programming professionally since 1979, and, in his own words, “maybe THIS year I’ll finally get it right!” His technical experience spans the gamut from FORTRAN on punched cards to React Native on the cloud. His creativity and enthusiasm for developing and sharing technology solutions is matched only by his penchant for setting himself on fire. Accidentally. Usually.
name: Mark Berkeland
title: Sr. Solutions Engineer
